title: Happy Birthday! Mari-chan
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Mari-san, happy birthday! Here’s a present for you♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Thank you, Kotori! Can I open it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Of course! I hope you like it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>This is.... an album?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah. Since we became friends with you guys, we have taken a lot of photos, right? I tried making an album with those photos.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Waaah, this was when we all went to Karaoke together, wasn’t it. It was that moment where Secchan sang anime songs so passionately!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>That’s right! This photo was from when everyone went bowling together. You, Eli-chan, and Karin-san scored a bunch of strikes, didn’t you, Mari-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That was really fun~! ....Oh, the back doesn’t have any photos, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe, I thought I’d leave the latter half empty because I want you to put in photos we’ll be taking in the future, Mari-san. Let’s create tons of memories together with everyone from now on, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Kotori....! Of course, let’s continue to be friends for now and forever!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
